Class StudioController

java.lang.Object
app.studios.StudioController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/studio") public class StudioController extends Object
Controller for managing studio-related operations. Provides endpoints to retrieve, search, save, and delete studio data.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudioController

      @Autowired public StudioController(StudioService studiosService)
      Constructor for the controller. Initializes the studio service and populates the list of fields in the Studio class.
      Parameters:
      studiosService - the service used to manage studio data.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Studio> findAll(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="20") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="Id") String sortParam, @RequestParam(defaultValue="ASC") String sortDirection)
      Retrieves a paginated and sorted list of studios.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to retrieve (default 0).
      size - the number of items per page (default 20).
      sortParam - the field to sort by (default "Id").
      sortDirection - the sorting direction ("ASC" or "DESC", default "ASC").
      Returns:
      a page containing the list of studios.

    • getStudioById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Studio getStudioById(@PathVariable Integer id)
      Retrieves a specific studio by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the studio.
      Returns:
      the studio object.

    • findStudiosByKeyword

      @GetMapping("/search") public List<Studio> findStudiosByKeyword(@RequestParam String keyword)
      Searches studios by a specific keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the search keyword.
      Returns:
      a list of studios matching the search criteria.

    • countAllStudios

      @GetMapping("/count") public long countAllStudios()
      Retrieves the total count of all studios.
      Returns:
      the total number of studios.

    • findTopStudios

      @GetMapping("/top") public List<Studio> findTopStudios(@RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int limit)
      Retrieves the top studios based on a specified limit.
      Parameters:
      limit - the maximum number of top studios to return (default 10).
      Returns:
      a list of top studios.

    • findStudiosAlphabetically

      @GetMapping("/alphabetical") public List<Studio> findStudiosAlphabetically()
      Retrieves a list of studios ordered alphabetically.
      Returns:
      a list of studios sorted in alphabetical order.

    • saveStudio

      @PostMapping public Studio saveStudio(@RequestBody Studio studio)
      Saves a new studio to the database.
      Parameters:
      studio - the studio object to save.
      Returns:
      the saved studio.

    • deleteStudio

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deleteStudio(@PathVariable Integer id)
      Deletes a studio by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the studio to delete.
